name: @tmnrp/react-breadcrumbs
description: Breadcrumbs is a component that can be used to display location of current route. Configurable icon, text and seperator as per need
author: TMRNP <harsh.harish1@gmail.com> (https://tmnrp-portfolio.vercel.app/)

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:pub:patch: npm run build && npm version patch &&npm publish
scripts.build:pub:minor: npm run build && npm version minor &&npm publish
scripts.build:pub:major: npm run build && npm version major &&npm publish
